attributes.action: Recommend Ken Davy for MBE for services to sport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ken Davy is a self made business man from Huddersfield. Not only did he put his money where his mouth is and save Huddersfield RLFC (one of the oldest rugby league clubs in the world), but also saved Huddersfield Town RLFC and carried them to a sustainable position where a football loving chairman bought them.
Ken still attends most games with his wife Jenny and is an absolute idol of the town.
His influence has brought local talent into superleague and local rugby league teams.
RL in the community is bigger in Huddersfield than ever before and it is all down to Ken!

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
